mapper.select: select c.id, c.category_name as categoryName, t.article_count as articleCount from blog_category as c left join( select category_id, count(*) as article_count from blog_article_category group by category_id )as t on c.id=t.category_id order by t.article_count desc;

select a.id, a.title, a.summary, a.create_time as createTime, u.username, a.comment_count as commentCount, a.view_count as viewCount from blog_article_category as ac left join blog_article as a on ac.article_id=a.id left join blog_user as u on a.user_id=u.id where ac.category_id=#{categoryId} order by a.create_time DESC
